We need to verify that game 61 is indeed one of the three games with a total score of 86 points, and not just one of multiple games. Since we found other rows (62 and 63) with the same value in cell "points", this confirms that game 61 is one of the three distinct games.

4. **Compare values**: Now we compare the points scored in game 61 (86) with those scored in game 60 (84). We need to check if 86 is exactly 10 more than 84.
